questions.question: What is the predominant color of the bottle's body?
What material appears to constitute the bottle?
What is the overall shape of the supplement container?
What is the apparent texture of the bottle's surface?
What color is the cap or lid on top of the bottle?
What type of closure mechanism is present on the bottle?
Is there a label present on the container, and if so, what is its color?
Describe the visual prominence of any printed text on the bottle.
Considering the printed information, what category of product is contained?
Is there a barcode visible on the bottle's side?
What is the orientation of the visible barcode on the bottle?
Does the bottle display a tamper-evident seal or feature?
What is the apparent size of the bottle relative to a human hand?
Are there any noticeable markings, beyond text, on the bottle?
What appears to be the state of the bottle, unopened or opened?
